name: Open Sky Community Services, Inc.
specialty: Custodial Care Facility, Adult Care Home

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Open Sky Community Services, Inc. is a Custodial Care Facility, Adult Care Home provider based in Whitinsville, MA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $32.9M in Medicaid payments across 498K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $32.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
